summary: Ship's officer finds himself in command of a lifeboat full of survivors of a sunken luxury liner.
cast: Tyrone Power|Mai Zetterling|Lloyd Nolan|Stephen Boyd|Moira Lister|James Hayter|Marie Lohr|Finlay Currie|John Stratton|Victor Maddern|Eddie Byrne|Noel Willman|Moultrie Kelsall|Robert Harris|Gordon Jackson|Clive Morton|David Langton|Ralph Michael|Orlando Martins|Danny Green|Laurence Naismith|Sheila Manahan|Clare Austin|Jill Melford|Ferdy Mayne|John Gray|David Barry|Austin Trevor|Derek Sydney|Colin Broadley
title: Seven Waves Away
